wikipedia_page.main: Dominic Cooper (born 1944) is a British novelist, poet and watchmaker. He won the Somerset Maugham Award for his novel The Dead of Winter (1975).

response: * Dominic Cooper for The Dead of Winter
* eFilmCritic.com interview with Dominic Cooper by Dan Lybarger

He married the artist Mary Stewart in 1940. There were four children, including the novelist Dominic Cooper and the pianist Imogen Cooper.Imogen Cooper website Cooper was appointed CBE in 1972. In retirement he turned increasingly to translation, including the collected essays of Pierre Boulez and a new translation of Tchaikovsky's Queen of Spades.Recorded as Pique Dame, RCA Victor 60992 (1991) He died in Richmond-upon-Thames.
* Judgements of Value (1988) (selected writings, ed. Dominic Cooper)
